bool  process_shared = false
)  [inline]
 

Initialize a semaphore object.

Parameters:
init_value start value for this semaphore.
process_shared true or false to share this semaphore among processes (this feature is not implemented).
Returns:
SUCCESS or FAILURE.

int32 uStreamLib::Semaphore::tryWait (  void   )  [inline]

Decrease semaphore. This method will block if semaphore's value is lesser or equal to 0.
